titles.title: Stop Wasting Archive Grants Act of 2013
To amend title 44, United States Code, to repeal the National Historical Publications and Records Commission, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 1/15/2013--Introduced. Stop Wasting Archive Grants Act of 2013 - Repeals provisions creating the National Historical Publications and Records Commission and its grant-making authority.
